backend/main.mo: Main actor for the Yesfour Infra backend, handling user profile CRUD, admin user management (delete, role update, account status toggle), task operations, and leaderboard/stats queries with role-based access control and file storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that upgrades existing UserProfile records by adding a default `accountStatus = #active` field to all entries in the userProfiles map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented feature IDs (admin Users menu, users list page, admin action controls, search/filter) to their source files, component dependencies, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose, covering styles, hooks, pages, and components for the Yesfour Infra Task Management app.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, covering background, foreground, primary, destructive, chart, and sidebar color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Yesfour Infra Task Management app, mounting the React app into a `#root` div and loading the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with routes for login, profile setup, and role-specific dashboards (employee/manager/admin) under a protected layout, plus a Sonner toaster.
frontend/src/components/DeleteUserConfir: Alert dialog component that confirms permanent user deletion, calling the `useDeleteUser` mutation and showing success/error toasts on completion.
frontend/src/components/DepartmentProduc: Card component displaying task status breakdowns, completion rate percentage, and total performance points for a given array of tasks.
frontend/src/components/EditUserRoleModa: A dialog modal that allows changing a user's role (Admin/Manager/Employee) via a dropdown, using the useUpdateUserRole mutation and showing toast notifications on success or failure.
frontend/src/components/GlobalTaskList.t: Renders a filterable list of tasks with dropdowns for department, status, and priority filters, displaying each task as a TaskCard with optional approval actions.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main app shell with a sticky top navigation bar showing role-based nav links, the company logo/brand, user profile badge, and a logout button.
frontend/src/components/LeaderboardTable: Displays a ranked performance leaderboard table showing employee name, department, role, and points, fetching each user's profile by principal.
frontend/src/components/ProofUploadButto: A file upload button for task proof submission that validates file type and size, tracks upload progress, and calls the useUploadProof mutation.
A dialog modal for rejecting a task that requires a non-empty rejection reason text, then calls the useRejectTask mutation and shows a toast on completion.
frontend/src/components/StatusBadge.tsx: A small presentational badge component that maps a TaskStatus enum value to a colored label (Overdue, In Progress, Proof Uploaded, Completed).
frontend/src/components/SummaryStatsCard: Renders a 4-card grid displaying summary statistics for total, completed, overdue, and in-progress task counts with color-coded icons.
frontend/src/components/TaskApprovalActi: Renders Approve and Reject buttons for tasks in 'blue' status, calling the approve mutation or opening a RejectTaskModal with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Displays a task's details (title, department, priority, approval status, deadline countdown) in a card layout with optional action buttons.
frontend/src/components/TaskCreationForm: Form component for creating and assigning a new task, with validation for all fields including Principal ID format, submitting via the createTask mutation.
frontend/src/components/UserAccountStatu: Small badge component that displays a user's account status as 'Active' or 'Inactive' with corresponding color styling.
frontend/src/components/UsersSummaryCard: Renders a grid of four summary stat cards showing total users, active users, managers, and employees derived from a UserStats array.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Hook that combines Internet Identity login state with the caller's user profile to expose authentication status, role flags, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdown.ts: Hook that computes a human-readable countdown string from a nanosecond deadline, updating every minute and flagging expired or urgent states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook that manage AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout flow, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profile CRUD, task fetching/creation, proof uploads, task approval/rejection, admin dashboard data, and user management mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Inter font, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines CSS custom properties for a corporate green light/dark theme including status color utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page displaying summary stats, a leaderboard, all tasks, and a users list in tabs, with auth-based redirects for non-admin or unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/EmployeeDashboard.tsx: Employee dashboard page showing the authenticated user's assigned tasks with quick-stat counters and proof upload capability, redirecting unauthenticated or unregistered users.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page that triggers Internet Identity authentication and redirects users to their role-appropriate dashboard or profile setup after successful sign-in.
frontend/src/pages/ManagerDashboard.tsx: Manager Dashboard page with three tabs: Create Task (TaskCreationForm), Review Tasks (GlobalTaskList with approval actions), and Productivity (DepartmentProductivityPanel). Redirects unauthenticated users and shows pending approval badge count.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupPage.tsx: Profile setup form for new users to enter their name, department, and role, then saves the profile via mutation and redirects to the appropriate role-based dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/UsersListPage.tsx: Admin page listing all users with search, role, and department filters, pagination, and actions to toggle account status, edit role, or delete a user.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence helpers and a function to remove sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom brand/task color tokens, typography, container queries, animation plugins, and design tokens (shadows, border radius, fonts) for the Yesfour Infra app.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the full-stack task management app for Yesfour Infra, including tech stack, architectural notes, departments, existing features, and workflow rules.
